alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 3:27PM MDT until June 11 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Teller County in central Colorado... Northwestern El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 326 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Westcreek, or 24 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Monument, Palmer Lake and Gleneagle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
